summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for the period of December 1, 2017, to December 31, 2017, detailing account balances, gains and losses, and portfolio holdings for Southern Trust Company Inc. It includes information on cash balances, securities transactions, and income generated from investments. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC detailing account activity for a specific period in 2017. It includes information on transactions, securities, and disclosures related to the management of the account. The document emphasizes the importance of understanding the terms and conditions of transactions and the role of Pershing as a clearing broker. This document contains financial statements and account information for Southern Trust Company Inc. for the period of November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017. It details account balances, transactions, and investment holdings, including cash, money market funds, and fixed income securities. The document also includes disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as the clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account activity for Southern Trust Company Inc. for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It includes information on account values, transactions, and portfolio holdings, highlighting significant cash and fixed income allocations. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances, transactions, and portfolio holdings for the period of September 1, 2017, to September 30, 2017. It includes information about cash balances, money market funds, and corporate bonds, as well as disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC detailing account transactions, holdings, and balances for a specific period. It includes information on dividends, interest income, and fees associated with the account, as well as disclosures regarding the handling of foreign currency transactions and margin accounts. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account information for an individual or entity, including account balances, transactions, and investment holdings. It includes disclosures about the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and outlines important arbitration disclosures related to the account. The document also provides a summary of portfolio holdings and investment performance over a specified period. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account information for Southern Trust Company Inc. It includes account balances, investment performance, and disclosures regarding transactions and fees. The statement covers the period from June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for an account held by Southern Trust Company Inc. It details account balances, transactions, and investment holdings over a specified period. The statement includes information about the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and various disclosures regarding transactions and account management. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to accounts held at Deutsche Bank and Southern Trust Company. It details transactions, account balances, and investment holdings for the period of April 1, 2017, to April 30, 2017, including income from dividends and interest, fees, and cash withdrawals. This document contains a financial statement detailing transactions and account information for Southern Trust Company Inc. for the period of March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It includes information on cash deposits, withdrawals, fees, and investment holdings, highlighting significant transactions involving Deutsche Bank. This document contains important information and disclosures related to the financial activities of Southern Trust Company Inc. with Pershing LLC, including account details, transaction summaries, and arbitration agreements. It outlines the roles and responsibilities of Pershing as a clearing broker and provides insights into the financial status of the account over a specified period. This document contains financial disclosures and account information for Southern Trust Company Inc. from Deutsche Bank, detailing transactions, fees, and portfolio holdings for the period of January 1, 2017, to January 31, 2017. It includes information on dividends, interest, and fees associated with the account, as well as important disclosures regarding the roles of Pershing and Standard & Poor's. This document contains financial transaction details related to an account managed by Deutsche Bank, including income received, fees, and account management information. It outlines the roles of Pershing as a clearing broker and provides important disclosures regarding arbitration agreements and account management.
